cocktail_recipes.name: OLD FASHIONED - STIR
cocktail_recipes.instructions: Build in mixing glass add ice stir to dilute then strain over big rock into Rocks glass. Garnish: Orange swath insert w cherries.

cocktail_recipes.name: CRANBERRY GIN SPRITZ - IN GLASS
cocktail_recipes.instructions: Add ice to wine glass Add  soda water on top of the ice Add the lime juice & cranberry gin Top with more soda finish with a quick stir and garnish to serve. Garnish: Half orange wheel insert.

cocktail_recipes.name: RAVENSWOOD SPRITZ - SHAKE
cocktail_recipes.instructions: Add ingredients to shaker tin with the cheapest ingredient first add ice shake  strain over ice into collins glass. Garnish: lemon wheel insert.

cocktail_recipes.name: PHONEY NEGRONI - IN GLASS
cocktail_recipes.instructions: Add ice to Collins glass add .75 oz of Gentiana  add the vermouth, cranberry, gin, and dry gin top with more Gentiana finish with a quick stir and garnish to serve. Garnish: orange swath expression & insert.

cocktail_recipes.name: NEGRONI - IN GLASS
cocktail_recipes.instructions: Add ingredients to mixing glass, add ice, stir for 40 rotations. Strain over big ice cube in rocks glass. Garnish: orange half moon insert.

cocktail_recipes.name: SHAMELESSLY NAMELESS - SHAKE
cocktail_recipes.instructions: Add ingredients to the shaker tin, starting with the cheapest ingredient first add ice shake and double strain over rocks in “water glass”  garnish to serve. Garnish: Lemon swath expression & insert.

cocktail_recipes.name: HOW BOUT A HUG? - STIR
cocktail_recipes.instructions: Add ingredients to mixing glass with the bitters first add sugar  add liquor top with ice and stir to dilute stain with julep over big rock in rocks glass. Garnish: Orange swath expression & “twist” insert.

cocktail_recipes.name: MIDNIGHT OIL - STIR
cocktail_recipes.instructions: Add ingredients to mixing glass top with ice stir to dilute strain over ice in “water glass”. Garnish: Lemon swath expression - insert.

cocktail_recipes.name: THAI CHILI COOLER - SHAKE
cocktail_recipes.instructions: Add ingredients to shaker tin top with ice shake and double strain over ice in collins glass. Garnish: Cucumber slice insert.

cocktail_recipes.name: ESPRESSO MARTINI - SHAKE
cocktail_recipes.instructions: Add ingredients to shaker tin add ice shake until you feel the shaker tin ice up on the outside double strain the cocktail into coupe. Serve Neat No Garnish.

cocktail_recipes.name: BEE’S KNEES - SHAKE
cocktail_recipes.instructions: Add ingredients to shaker tin add ice shake until tin iCes up on the outside double strain into coupe garnish. Garnish: Lemon wheel insert.

cocktail_recipes.name: GINGER RICKEY - IN GLASS
cocktail_recipes.instructions: Add lime and ginger liqueur to collins glass, add ice, top with soda water. Garnish: Lime wheel insert.

cocktail_recipes.name: CRANBERRY HOT TODDY - IN GLASS
cocktail_recipes.instructions: Add ingredients to mug top with hot water garnish. Garnish: Lemon wheel insert with star anise on top.

cocktail_recipes.name: BOURBON HOT TODDY - IN GLASS
cocktail_recipes.instructions: Add ingredients to mug top with hot water garnish. Garnish: Lemon wheel and cinnamon stick insert.

cocktail_recipes.name: ROSE HIP HOT TODDY - IN GLASS
cocktail_recipes.instructions: Add ingredients to mug top with hot water garnish. Garnish: Lemon wheel insert.

cocktail_recipes.name: PITCH A TENT - STIR
cocktail_recipes.instructions: Add ingredients to mixing glass  add ice stir to dilute. Garnish: Top w Lapsang Tea Spray.

cocktail_recipes.name: BARREL AGED MANHATTAN - IN GLASS
cocktail_recipes.instructions: Made to order: 'On the rocks' = Add ingredients to water glass add ice stir down to dilute top with a couple more ice cubes garnish to serve. 'Neat' = Add ingredients to mixing glass add ice stir to dilute strain into Nick & Nora Garnish: cherry in glass. 'Batched' Method: Add the Ango & Rosehip Liqueur to the water glass add ice fill glass with batch until the drink looks full. Garnish: Cherries on a pick.

cocktail_recipes.name: MULES (Base Recipe)

ingredients.item: Base Spirit (e.g., Vodka, Gin, Whiskey, Rum, Brandy)

cocktail_recipes.instructions: Add ice to copper julep  add a little bit of ginger beer at the base  Add Lime, simple, and base spirit Top with more ginger beer give the drink a quick stir garnish to serve. Garnish: Lime wheel- insert.

cocktail_recipes.name: HIGH BALL (e.g., Gin & Tonics, Vodka Soda)
cocktail_recipes.instructions: Add ice to collins glass add a little bit of soda to the base add spirit top with more soda. Ask guest if they would like a lemon or a lime for their garnish place lemon or lime wedge on the edge of the glass.

cocktail_recipes.name: LET IT LINGER - SHAKE
cocktail_recipes.instructions: Add ingredients to shaker tin with the cheapest ingredient first add ice shake  strain into coup glass. Garnish: lime wheel.

cocktail_recipes.name: THE FRANKENSTEIN - SHAKE
cocktail_recipes.instructions: Add ingredients to shaker tin with the cheapest ingredient first add ice shake  strain over big cube in rocks glass. Garnish: dehydrated lime wheel on top.

cocktail_recipes.name: BLACKBERRY SOUR - SHAKE
cocktail_recipes.instructions: Add ingredients to shaker tin with the cheapest ingredient first add ice shake  strain over big cube in rocks glass. Garnish: dehydrated lime wheel on top.
Add ingredients to stemless wine glassand add ice to fill. Garnish: Lemon wheel insert.

cocktail_recipes.name: JP Bulldog - STIR
cocktail_recipes.instructions: Add ingredients to mixing glass  add ice stir to dilute. Garnish: Shaken heavy cream with grated nutmeg.
